name: Imperial Paeonia
description:
For the love of peonies.  This is a print of the original pencil drawing.

Printed on premium archival paper with archival inks, this mini print will last you your lifetime. Additionally, the quality of print and the shading of coloured pencils allows the image to appear as if its the original drawing.

Print DETAILS:

· paper size is 8.5x11 inches (approx. A4 size) 
· white surrounds edges of print 
· made to fit an 8x10 inch frame 
· signed and titled on the front 
· printed on acid-free archival paper 
· printed with archival inks

· Each and every product offered in this online boutique is printed in studio and handled with care. This print will be signed, titled and packaged securely in a plastic sleeve. It will be mailed in a sturdy mailer for added safety.

· Colours, although are printed with brilliant and archival inks, the colours of your monitor may be slightly different than the print itself. However, please be assured my prints are as close as possible to the original portrait

· Please allow 1-5 days for processing prior to shipment.  Further information regarding shipping can be found on the FAQ page.

name: Untitled with Flowers
description:
As described on sheriemyers.com:

'A young girl staring back at the viewer, flowers in her hair, a sense of innocence and naïveté - somewhat represents where I belong in the online art community when it comes to portraits.

As one of my first graphite drawings in a sea of online artists, Untitled with Flowers is only the beginning.'

Printed on premium archival paper with archival inks, this mini print will last you your lifetime. Additionally, the quality of print and the shading of coloured pencils allows the image to appear as if its the original drawing.

Print DETAILS:

· paper size is 8.5x11 inches (approx. A4 size) 
· white surrounds edges of print 
· made to fit an 8x10 inch frame 
· signed and titled on the front 
· printed on acid-free archival paper 
· printed with archival inks

· Each and every product offered in this online boutique is printed in studio and handled with care. This print will be signed, titled and packaged securely in a plastic sleeve. It will be mailed in a sturdy mailer for added safety.

· Colours, although are printed with brilliant and archival inks, the colours of your monitor may be slightly different than the print itself. However, please be assured my prints are as close as possible to the original portrait

· Please allow 1-5 days for processing prior to shipment.  Further information regarding shipping can be found on the FAQ page.
